Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Provides that certain funds wagered on video lottery gaming shall be utilized for the purpose of funding capital expenditures of the metropolitan transportation authority
Summary: Provides that certain funds wagered on video lottery gaming shall be utilized for the purpose of funding capital expenditures of the metropolitan transportation authority; establishes the MTA support fund.
LawCode: Amd ยง1612, Tax L; add ยง99-hh, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the investment of funds wagered on video lottery gaming; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the MTA support fund
